title: Place selling food in a casino? (idk the name)

fields.name: Rent:
fields.value:
`- Base: $0~35
- With 1 Investments: $25~125
- With 2 Investments: $50~250
- With 3 Investments: $75~375
- With 4 Investments: $125~500
- With 5 Investments: $150~750`

fields.name: Stop-In Effects:
fields.value:
- Gain a 1-use effect, when one of your rolls is done, you may add/remove up to **2** from it, if not the owner, you must pay the current minimum rent x2 for using the effect.
- If the owner, you may add or remove up to **4** with the effect.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If the owner, you may use the **Stop-In** effect for free when stopping by.

Investiments cost $50 each.
